remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 XSD 数据类型的详细信息，请参阅在 MSDN 库中的"XML 的数据类型参考" http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about XSD data types, see "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类用于包装 XSD`time`类型。The following code example demonstrates using the class to wrap an XSD `time` type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是能够分析 HH:mm:ss.fffzzz 格式的字符串。The method is capable of parsing strings in the HH:mm:ss.fffzzz format. 这被由以下的格式模式。This is composed out of the following format patterns. |格式模式Format Pattern|描述Description|示例Examples| |--------------------|-----------------|--------------| |HHHH|24 时制范围内的小时。The hour within a 24-hour range. 一位数小时具有前导零。Single-digit hours have a leading zero.|17, 0717, 07| |mmmm|分钟。The minute. 一位数分钟具有前导零。Single-digit minutes have a leading zero.|49, 0549, 05| |ssss|第二个。The second. 一位数秒具有前导零。Single-digit seconds have a leading zero.|32, 0232, 02| |ffffff|秒的小数。The fraction of a second. 允许最多 7 小数部分的位数，并分析仅的前三个的。A maximum of 7 fraction digits are allowed, and only the first three are parsed.|321635, 4592321635, 4592| |zzzzzz|完整时区偏移量 （小时和分钟） 从通用协调时间 （格林威治标准时间）。The full time zone offset (hour and minutes) from the Universal Time Coordinate (Greenwich Mean Time). 一位数小时具有前导零。Single-digit hours have a leading zero.|-07:00, +08:00, Z-07:00, +08:00, Z| 分析仅第三个小数位的因为已分析的值存储为对象，与类型支持精确 3 个小数位的准确性。Only the first 3 fraction digits are parsed because the parsed value is stored as a object, and the type supports precisely 3 fraction digits of accuracy. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows how to use this method. 此代码示例是一个更大的示例为提供的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime/CPP/demo.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapTime/CS/demo.cs#11)]

exception.span: 不包含与任何识别的格式模式相对应的日期和时间。

span.span: does not contain a date and time that corresponds to any of the recognized format patterns.
